title: Apple has released iOS 15.4 developer beta 4, here’s what’s new
content:
Apple has released iOS 15.4 beta 4 to registered developers, following the release of beta 3 last week. Unlike iOS 15.3, iOS 15.4 comes packed with new features, changes, and additions. This includes support for Face ID when masked, new emoji, Keychain updates, and much more. To download this update, you have to be enrolled

The post Apple has released iOS 15.4 developer beta 4, here’s what’s new appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Apple has released iOS 15.4 beta 4 to registered developers. This version of iOS comes packed with changes, including new emoji.
